text.div:
This value set includes codes based on the following rules:

  • Include these codes as defined in http://loinc.org version 2.7
    CodeDisplay
    2339-0Glucose [Mass/volume] in Blood
    2345-7Glucose [Mass/volume] in Serum or Plasma
    41651-1Glucose [Mass/volume] in Arterial blood
    2340-8Glucose [Mass/volume] in Blood by Automated test strip
    32016-8Glucose [Mass/volume] in Capillary blood
    41652-9Glucose [Mass/volume] in Venous blood
    74774-1Glucose [Mass/volume] in Serum, Plasma or Blood
    41653-7Glucose [Mass/volume] in Capillary blood by Glucometer
    96594-7Glucose [Mass/volume] in DBS
    93791-2Glucose [Mass/volume] mean in Serum or Plasma
    2341-6Glucose [Mass/volume] in Blood by Test strip manual
  • Include these codes as defined in https://www.mdanderson.org/oid:1.2.840.114350.1.13.412.2.7.5.737384.134 version 1
    CodeDisplay
    5651POC Glucose
    5946IF Ab Comment-Mayo
    5699Glucose Level
    7962V Gluc

name: Glucose
title: Glucose
description: LOINC codes indicating the measurement of Glucose Adding proprietary MDA codes
